text:
- What's really great about
infrastructure event management
is, you know, there's a whole process

around how AWS support
handles these events.

There's a proactive
look around how alerting
is set up and monitoring.
Really able to solve challenges prior to,
you know, prior to the event taking place.
Paramount Global is fortunate enough

to have a team of
technical account managers.
We call them TAMs.

What we're able to do is
leverage our relationship
with our TAMS and our AWS support team
to present our business challenges
and allow them to facilitate conversations

with product teams and product
managers to introduce us

to tools that can help
us meet those challenges
and our business goals.

We're also able to leverage
a lot of the programs
like Trusted Advisor and integrate them

into our established
operational processes.
So we take data that is available,
you know, through these programs.
It really helps us alleviate problems
before they become service impacting.
(lively music)
